html.content:
SPecial Offers from The Gates Hotel Times Square

Want breakfast? A great advance-purchase rate? Take the first step toward your New York trip by taking your pick from our special offers. Here in the Gates, you’ll find awe-inspiring design, luxurious rooms, and a true NYC boutique-hotel vibe. Moments from our doors, you’ll find everything from the brilliance of Broadway to hidden restaurants (ssshhh...).
